Uses of Class
net.sf.jgcs.GroupException

  • Packages that use GroupException 
    Package Description
    net.sf.jgcs
    Defines a generic interface for group communication.
    net.sf.jgcs.spi
    Supports service providers with a set of abstract classes that ease the implementation of bindings to concrete group communication protocols.

    • Uses of GroupException in net.sf.jgcs

      Subclasses of GroupException in net.sf.jgcs 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClosedProtocolException
      Thrown when trying to use a closed protocol.
      class  ClosedSessionException
      Thrown when trying to use a closed session.
      class  InvalidStateException
      Thrown when an operation cannot be performed in the current group state.
      Methods in net.sf.jgcs with parameters of type GroupException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ExceptionListener.onException(GroupException exception)
      Notification of an exception that occurred when the underlying implementation was receiving or otherwise processing a message.
      Methods in net.sf.jgcs that throw GroupException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BlockSession.blockOk()
      This method must be used by the application after it received a block notification and flushed all pending messages.
      Message DataSession.createMessage()
      Creates an empty message that can be used (transmitted) through the session.
      Protocol ProtocolFactory.createProtocol()
      Creates a new protocol instance or connection.
      void ControlSession.join()
      Joins the group.
      void ControlSession.leave()
      Leaves the group.
      ControlSession Protocol.openControlSession(GroupConfiguration group)
      Obtains a control session for a group.
      DataSession Protocol.openDataSession(GroupConfiguration group)
      Obtains a data session for a group.
      void BlockSession.setBlockListener(BlockListener listener)
      Registers a listener for the block notification.
